roleset.name: natural disaster: sever blowing dust

example.name: duststorm-n: arg5
example.text: Widespread duststorm with visibility reduced to less than 5 miles over western half of State.
example.arg: with visibility reduced to less than 5 miles over western half of State.

example.name: dust_storm-n: arg2, concatenation and relemmatization
example.text: I've slept on the high desert in a 50 mph dust storm with the full moon glowing through from above.

roleset.note: DUSTSTORM-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to 'haboob'. (from duststorm.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.
